answers.answer: I dunno what that means exactly. Like what kind of fluid... is it dangerous? I would call my dr and hammer him with questions

I had this aswell,  they will do a glucose test, to check for diabetes  & sum bloods to check for infections & scan u to check if ur fluid levels go any higher.... Mine didt luckily they went down by 1 cm at my next scan,  it can b for lots of reasons sometimes they just dont no y! My cousin had the same thing with both her girls & both r heathly! If it dose increase u may have to have it drained but I dont think this is very common try nor to worry to much & dont google!!!! Seriously if u want to no more call ur midwife who will b happy to explain anything u want no :-) good luck

I had it with both my first and second. So far they haven't found extra fluid this time,  but i am measuring 6wks ahead...have another ultrasound beginning of april.I did have some complications with my first because of it but my second wasn't so bad. Ask your dr and just be aware.

Samething happened to me. From about 24 weeks until 31 weeks I was measuring big. US kept showing a lot of fluid around baby. I got growth scans every 2-4 weeks to check fluid levels.I did my glucose test again to confirm if I had diabetes or not (came back normal). By 31 weeks everything was back to normal. To be on the safe side I have to do non stress test starting in 10 days just to monitor baby. I wouldn't worry to much, but definitely ask questions if you have concerns or just want some peace of mind. I have all my US done at Maternal Fetal Medicine and right after a doctor always comes in and explains things to me and answers any of my questions. Prayers everything goes back to normal for you.
Omg thanks guys yu made me feel so much better ! Can't talk to my doc til Monday but im going to try and keep calm and not worry too much!

question: So just had my ultrasound because i was measuring big and they.told me i have a.lot.of fluid around baby and i.have to.come back in a few weeks im kinda worried btw 28 week and 5 days!
title: kinda worried
